data.actual_result: the sensitivity bar that indicates vocal activity in voice/video settings shows the last known volume of your voice
data.expected_result: the sensitivity bar indicating vocal activity in voice/video settings should go away
data.short_description: Vocal sensitivity in voice/video settings shows last known vocal "loudness" if you will, even after you have left a voice channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice chat - Start speaking - Leave the voice channel while still talking
